ygData.subject: Re: What wisdom increasing items are available?
ygData.msgSnippet: well, lesse the wis items i know of.... savant s cap....unrest....3 wis charred guardian shield.....sol a.....9 wis ethereal mist greeves.....fearplane.....9
ygData.messageBody:
well, lesse the wis items i know of....
savant's cap....unrest....3 wis
charred guardian shield.....sol a.....9 wis
ethereal mist greeves.....fearplane.....9 wis
gatorscale legs....upper guk...3 wis
jewel encrusted sceptre.....mistmoore.....5 wis
ethereal mist bp....fearplane.....15 wis
runed circlet....perma....4 wis
runed mithril bracers......sol b....5 wis
obsv staff.....quest item.....9 wis
foreman tunic...sol a....4 wis <i think>

there's some that i know of just to name a few......lots of others, but i can't
think of them atm (:

Chris Wheeler wrote:

> From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
>
> Hi all,
>
> I am a level 10 halfling cleric of Bristlebane, Brytewing on the Rathe
> server. I have spent my life in Rivervale, Misty Thicket, and am now
> venturing into RunneyEye with small groups.
>
> My question is this: I have heard alot of talk about wisdom increaing
> items. However, I have yet to see any in my gameplaying experiences. Could
> some of you more experienced players give me a hint as to what items
> increase wisdom, and perhaps where I could best find them?
>
> Many thanks.
>
